First, visit the experiment list to see what you can do.
Choose an experiment from the list and examine the parameters.
You can change the parameters with Code Notes cards or manually from the menu.
To code the parameters choose Code from the bottom bar.
After setting parameters you can start the experiment to see how it is going.
You can use chatbot for small talks or talking about the experiments.
